attributes.action: REVIEW THE STAMP DUTY LIMIT TO HELP FIRST TIME BUYERS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current 1% stamp duty of properties valued at £250k should be increased to properties valued at £300k due to the increasing cost of buying a home especially in the South East.  This small step would benefit an awful lot of first time buyers.

rejection.details: Please resubmit without BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
